verses.verse: But the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G4490>explicitly<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> that in <S%G5306>later<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> will <S%G868>fall<s%> <S%G868>away<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4337>paying<s%> <S%G4337>attention<s%> to <S%G4108>deceitful<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> and <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G1140>demons,<s%>
by <S%G1722>means<s%> of the <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> of <S%G5573>liars<s%> <S%G2741>seared<s%> in their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> as with a <S%G2741>branding<s%> <S%G2741>iron,<s%>

[men] who <S%G2967>forbid<s%> <S%G1060>marriage<s%> [and advocate] <S%G568>abstaining<s%> from <S%G1033>foods,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2936>created<s%> to be <S%G3326>gratefully<s%> <S%G2169><s%> <S%G3336>shared<s%> in by <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4103>believe<s%> and <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2938>created<s%> by <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> and <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is to be <S%G579>rejected,<s%> if it is <S%G2983>received<s%> with <S%G2169>gratitude;<s%>
for it is <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by <S%G1223>means<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G1783>prayer.<s%>

In <S%G5294>pointing<s%> out <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to the <S%G80>brethren,<s%> you will be a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1249>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> [constantly] <S%G1789>nourished<s%> on the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%> and of the <S%G2570>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have been <S%G3877>following.<s%>

But <S%G3868>have<s%> <S%G3868>nothing<s%> to <S%G3868>do<s%> with <S%G952>worldly<s%> <S%G3454>fables<s%> <S%G1126>fit<s%> <S%G1126>only<s%> for <S%G1126>old<s%> <S%G1126>women.<s%> On the <S%G1161>other<s%> <S%G1161>hand,<s%> <S%G1128>discipline<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> for the purpose of <S%G2150>godliness;<s%>

for <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1129>discipline<s%> is only of <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G5624>profit,<s%> but <S%G2150>godliness<s%> is <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> since it <S%G2192>holds<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> for the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> and [also] for the [life] to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

For it is for <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G2872>labor<s%> and <S%G75>strive,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we have <S%G1679>fixed<s%> our <S%G1679>hope<s%> on the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G4990>Savior<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> of <S%G4103>believers.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G2706>look<s%> <S%G2706>down<s%> on your <S%G3503>youthfulness,<s%> but [rather] in <S%G3056>speech,<s%> <S%G391>conduct,<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> [and] <S%G47>purity,<s%> <S%G1096>show<s%> yourself an <S%G5179>example<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4103>believe.<s%>
<S%G2193>Until<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G4337>give<s%> <S%G4337>attention<s%> to the [public] <S%G320>reading<s%> [of Scripture,] to <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> and <S%G1319>teaching.<s%>

Do not <S%G272>neglect<s%> the <S%G5486>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> you, <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> upon you <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4394>prophetic<s%> <S%G4394>utterance<s%> with the <S%G1936>laying<s%> on of <S%G5495>hands<s%> by the <S%G4244>presbytery.<s%>

<S%G3191>Take<s%> <S%G3191>pains<s%> with <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things;<s%> be [absorbed] in them, <S%G2443>so<s%> that your <S%G4297>progress<s%> may be <S%G5318>evident<s%> to <S%G3956>all.<s%>

<S%G1907>Pay<s%> <S%G1907>close<s%> <S%G1907>attention<s%> to <S%G4572>yourself<s%> and to your <S%G1319>teaching;<s%> <S%G1961>persevere<s%> in <S%G846>these<s%> <S%G846>things;<s%> for as you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> you will <S%G4982>insure<s%> <S%G4982>salvation<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> for <S%G4572>yourself<s%> and for <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>hear<s%> you.
